Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31394 affecting package rust for versions less than hyper-0.14.25
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-31394 affecting package rust for versions less than hyper-0.14.25. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package rust is earlier than hyper-0.14.25, affected by CVE-2022-31394
